[enemygroup]
# 3 snakes
type=snake
location=12,20,5,3
level=1,1
number=3,3

[event]
# Fake chest
type=run_once
location=14,13,1,1
hotspot=location
mapmod=object,14,13,206
spawn=ghost,13,14
tooltip=Chest

[event]
# Teleport to Castle2
type=on_trigger
location=31,22,1,4
intermap=castle2.txt,3,20

[event]
# Teleport to Castle5
type=on_trigger
location=0,22,1,4
intermap=castle5.txt,30,25

[event]
# Teleport to Castle4
type=on_trigger
location=14,10,1,1
intermap=castle4.txt,15,30
